013package org.apache.juneau.microservice.resources;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.rest.annotation.*;
016import org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet.*;
017
018/**
019 * Provides the capability to shut down this REST microservice through a REST call.
020 *
021 * <ul class='seealso'>
022 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-microservice-core">juneau-microservice-core</a>
023 * </ul>
024 *
025 * @serial exclude
026 */
027@Rest(
028   path="/shutdown",
029   title="Shut down this resource"
030)
031public class ShutdownResource extends BasicRestServlet {
032
033   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
034
035   /**
036    * [GET /] - Shutdown this resource.
037    *
038    * @return The string <js>"OK"</js>.
039    */
040   @RestGet(path="/", description="Show contents of config file.")
041   public String shutdown() {
042      new Thread(
043         new Runnable() {
044            @Override /* Runnable */
045            public void run() {
046               try {
047                  Thread.sleep(1000);
048                  System.exit(0);
049               } catch (InterruptedException e) {
050                  e.printStackTrace();
051               }
052            }
053         }
054      ).start();
055      return "OK";
056   }
057}
